Articles.Content:
First I'd like to say, career mode is a good starting point and awesome

But I do not like the tech tree very much that unlocked tech is not displayed.

As a result, we do not know which way to go sometimes.

Especially for some specific aero-program like station or aero-plane which require different parts.

What I suggest that all the tech-tree tiers can be displayed while unlocked tech is rendered in gray.

In this case, people can easily find their upgrading path.
